Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes

Class BuyScene

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.observer.Observable<ClientController>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes.BasicSceneUpdater
it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes.BuyScene
public class BuyScene extends BasicSceneUpdater
basicly the shop of cards inside game, allow to buy card and position them inside Dashboard
